itunes:subtitle: A mass shooting on the subway in Brooklyn has left dozens injured -- plus Canadian Army veteran Kelsi Sheren joins the show to talk about how oppressive the Canadian government and Justin Trudeau have gotten with COVID restrictions and government censors...
itunes:summary:
